column5: My advice from personal experience is to get help on your own and dont tell your parents they will just make you feel like shit about having mental health issues its not fair but thats just how parents are

Your parents believe in depression because everyone has been depressed atleast once in their life. They are just in denial as most parents are about everything. To be completely honest with you your parents will probably completely disagree with you on any statement of you having mental illness like mine did.
